prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that looks cheerful and has a round body with fins.
Imagine a cute aquatic creature with a smiling face and blue accents.
Design a small, friendly Pokemon that thrives in wetland environments.
Generate an adorable, amphibious Pokemon with distinctive round features and vibrant colors.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small frog with a joyful expression and streamlined shape.
Show me a whimsical water creature with a simplistic design and an inviting personality.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies playfulness with its bubbly demeanor and aquatic traits.
